Item.name: Alien Harpoon Launcher
Item.description: A harpoon gun of unknown origin, though it's certainly very effective at pulling.

Item.name: Alien Disabler
Item.description: A powerful laser-based stun weapon, how it works is beyond the mind of any human.

Item.name: Fractal Laser Rifle
Item.description: A laser SMG that functions similarly to the laser rifle, though the self charging circuitry is impossibly complex.

Item.name: Fractal Power Cell
Item.description: An absurdly complicated cell that somehow recharges itself. Perhaps it's a small reactor...?

Item.name: Riot Grenade
Item.description: A modified smoke grenade, it emits an irritant and mildly toxic gas that causes victims to cough violently.

Item.name: 40mm Riot Grenade
Item.description: A version of the riot grenades that can be fired from a 40mm launcher.

Item.name: Neurotoxin Grenade
Item.description: A modified smoke grenade, it emits a neurotoxin capable of causing temporary paralysis and oxygen loss.

Item.name: Neurotoxin Charge
Item.description: A brick made of solidified neurotoxin. When the plastic explosive inside detonates, deadly powder is sent into the atmosphere.

Item.name: 40mm Neurotoxin Grenade
Item.description: A version of the riot grenades that can be fired from a 40mm launcher.

Item.name: Sulphuric Acid Aerosol Grenade
Item.description: A smoke grenade modified to deploy a cloud of highly corrosive aerosol.

Item.name: 40mm Sulphuric Acid Aerosol Grenade
Item.description: A version of the SAA grenades that can be fired from a 40mm launcher.

Item.name: Hyperius Asperivirus Canister
Item.description: Deploys a cloud of alien blood infected with Hyperius Asperivirus.

Item.name: 40mm Hyperius Asperivirus Grenade
Item.description: A version of the HA grenades that can be fired from a 40mm launcher.

Item.name: Airborne Velonaceps Grenade
Item.description: A modified smoke grenade, it emits a cloud of crawler blood laced with husk eggs.

Item.name: 40mm Airborne Velonaceps Grenade
Item.description: A version of the husk gas grenades that can be fired from a 40mm launcher.

Item.name: Raptorbane Aerosol Grenade
Item.description: A modified smoke grenade, it emits a gas which is highly poisonous to mudraptors.

Item.name: 40mm Raptorbane Aerosol Grenade
Item.description: A version of the Raptorbane grenades that can be fired from a 40mm launcher.

Item.name: Pomegrenade Extract Aerosol Grenade
Item.description: A modified smoke grenade, it emits a mildly effective healing cloud.

Item.name: 40mm PEA Grenade
Item.description: A version of the Pomegrenade Extract Aerosol grenades that can be fired from a 40mm launcher.

Item.name: Narco Deagle
Item.description: The weapon of choice for any shady smugglers.

Item.name: Narco Deagle Stendo Mag
Item.description: An extended magazine of 12.7x33mm ammo compatible with the Narco Deagle.

Item.name: Clown Grenade
Item.description: A modified smoke grenade, it does a little clowning around.

Item.name: 40mm Clown Grenade
Item.description: A version of the clown grenades that can be fired from a 40mm launcher.

Item.name: Father's Retribution
Item.description: A cursed blade, made to avenge fallen brothers.

Item.name: Father's Vengeance
Item.description: Pure hatred condensed into one point. Don't miss, my child.

Item.name: Calyx's Bite
Item.description: Mutagenic potential in the palm of your hand.

Item.name: Shockhammer
Item.description: A large, heavy sledgehammer with an internal miniaturized discharge coil.

Item.name: Force Spell
Item.description: An arcane incantation that launches a single target great distances.

Item.name: Elder Force Spell
Item.description: An arcane incantation that pushes enemies away.

Item.name: Lightning Spell
Item.description: A spell which allows the user to cast bolts of stunning lightning.

Item.name: Harbinger Lightning Spell
Item.description: A spell which allows the user to cast bolts of stunning lightning.

Item.name: Elder Lightning Spell
Item.description: A spell which allows the user to cast bolts of stunning lightning.

Item.name: Elder Fire Spell
Item.description: Purify the nonbelievers with flame.

Item.name: Binding Spell
Item.description: An arcane incantation that temporarily binds a target's hands. Requires a Binding Incantation to fire.

Item.name: Bound Hands
Item.description: Your hands are bound by magic.

Item.name: Crushing Spell
Item.description: An arcane incantation that crushes a target.

Item.name: Mini Singularity
Item.description: A singularity that is too small to completely devour individuals, therefore it just crushes them.

Item.name: Immolation Spell
Item.description: A dark incantation that engulfs a single target in flame.

Item.name: Demonspike Spell
Item.description: A dark spell that summons a demonic spike to pierce targets.

Item.name: Antimatter Revolver Round
Item.description: A revolver round with an antimatter tip, capable of erasing anything it hits.

Item.name: Singularity (Small)
Item.description: A singularity. I'm not entirely sure how you're reading this, you should probably be dead.

Item.name: Singularity (Medium)
Item.description: A larger singularity, something to fear.

Item.name: Singularity (Large)
Item.description: Run while you still can!

Item.name: Singularity (Massive)
Item.description: Run while you still can!

Item.name: Singularity (Supermassive)
Item.description: Run while you still can!

Item.name: Singularity (Hypermassive)
Item.description: Run while you still can!

Item.name: Vortex Grenade
Item.description: A singularity contained within a grenade. It will erase anything that enters it.

Item.name: Implosion Grenade
Item.description: A grenade designed to create a vacuum, pulling in nearby targets and doing moderate damage.

Item.name: Compound T
Item.description: A miniaturized fuel-air explosive, providing an extreme radius but low damage compared to other explosive options. It has been modified to work underwater via oxidizer.

Item.name: Thermobaric Grenade
Item.description: A miniaturized fuel-air explosive, providing an extreme radius but low damage compared to other explosive options. It has been modified to work underwater via oxidizer.

Item.name: 40mm Thermobaric Grenade
Item.description: A version of the Thermobaric grenades that can be fired from a 40mm launcher.

Item.name: Hollow Railgun Shell
Item.description: A hollowed-out railgun shell that has very low innate damage but can store 2 explosives.

Item.name: Gutter Railgun Shell
Item.description: A powerful anti-submarine shell based on the hollow shell which passes through up to 3 walls before detonating a fuel-air and C-4 tandem warhead.

Item.name: Injector Railgun Shell
Item.description: The success of the gutter shell and chemical weapon programs gave the Coalition an idea: Why not combine the two? This is the result. The emitted chems depend on the chemical grenade that is inserted.

Item.name: Shell Yeeter
Item.description: Woe, railgun shell be upon ye.

Item.name: Shell Yeeter (Slow)
Item.description: Woe, railgun shell be upon ye.

Item.name: Shell Yeeter (Loud)
Item.description: Woe, railgun shell be upon ye.

Item.name: Shotgun Rubber Shell
Item.description: A shotgun round that fires a spray of small rubber bullets to overwhelm and stun targets.

Item.name: Aerosol Sprayer
Item.description: A short-ranged option for those who want more application for their aerosols. Insert an oxygen tank and one aerosol grenade.

Item.name: Killer's Machete
Item.description: An exceptionally sharp blade, capable of cutting through anything with ease.

Item.name: Eternal Killer's Machete
Item.description: An exceptionally sharp blade, capable of cutting through anything with ease. It will never be separated from its one true wielder.

Item.name: Bleeding Machete
Item.description: An odd machete which seems to be constantly leaking highly caustic human blood.

Item.name: Eternally Bleeding Machete
Item.description: An odd machete which seems to be constantly leaking highly caustic human blood. It can never be separated from its wielder.

Item.name: Remote Trigger [Channel 1]
Item.description: A signalling device, configured to trigger remote detonators.

Item.name: Remote Trigger [Channel 2]
Item.description: A signalling device, configured to trigger remote detonators.

Item.name: Remote Trigger [Channel 3]
Item.description: A signalling device, configured to trigger remote detonators.

Item.name: Remote Trigger [Channel E]
Item.description: A signalling device, configured to trigger remote detonators.

Item.name: Remote Detonator [Channel 1]
Item.description: A remotely activated detonator. It can only be activated with a properly configured trigger device.

Item.name: Remote Detonator [Channel 2]
Item.description: A remotely activated detonator. It can only be activated with a properly configured trigger device.

Item.name: Remote Detonator [Channel 3]
Item.description: A remotely activated detonator. It can only be activated with a properly configured trigger device.

Item.name: Remote Detonator [Channel E]
Item.description: A remotely activated detonator. It can only be activated with a properly configured trigger device.

Item.name: Suitcase Bomb Detonator
Item.description: A signalling device, configured to trigger bomb suitcases.

Item.name: Whiteglove Toolbox
Item.description: A handy toolbox distributed to Whitegloves.

Item.name: Anomalous Nasonov Artifact
Item.description: This particular artifact seems to be pulsing with a far greater amount of energy than usual.. Exercise caution if you choose to deconstruct it.

A .30 caliber bolt-action rifle with an attached suppressor. Its mechanism has also been modified to reduce noise output, but reloads are slightly slower as a result. A special-purpose suppressor retains the grenade launching feature but fails to suppress the sound.
A .30 caliber bolt-action rifle with an attached suppressor. Its mechanism has also been modified to reduce noise output, but reloads are slightly slower as a result.

Item.name: Physicorium Rifle Bullet
Item.description: .30 caliber bullets with an increased powder load, Physicorium jacket, and a depleted fuel core, allowing for excellent armor penetration.

Item.name: MMG
Item.description: A rather bulky watertight medium machine gun. Its heavy 7.62x51mm rounds have a lot of power going both ways, so unskilled users may not be able to handle the recoil.

Item.name: High-Capacity MMG Magazine
Item.description: A large watertight box magazine holding 150 supercavitating 7.62x51mm rounds.

Item.name: MMG Round
Item.description: 7.62x51mm supercavitating round.
This variant of the common Coalition rifle has a higher rate of fire at the cost of reduced magazine capacity and accuracy.

Item.name: Surplus Rifle Round
Item.description: These cheap rifle rounds have a lower velocity and thus less armor penetration, but have the capacity to deal decent damage against unarmored targets.

Item.name: Pocket Shotgun
Item.description: A firing spring extracted from a standard Coalition riot shotgun blueprint, capable of attaching and firing a single shotgun shell.. If you're brave enough.

Item.name: Blessed Salt Vial
Item.description: A container of blessed salt which can stave off demons and aid in the recovery of Soul-based ailments.

Item.name: Cursed Powder Vial
Item.description: A container of cursed powder which will bring Penance upon its victims.

Item.name: Advanced EMP Grenade
Item.description: An electromagnetic pulse emitting device which has been precision-calibrated to resonate with explosive primers, causing all nearby explosive items to detonate. As a result of its calibration, however, it does not interfere with electronics.

Item.name: Nuclear Casing
Item.description: A heavy metal casing designed to contain and detonate a nuclear core. For safety reasons, the core comes separately and a control chip is required to arm the weapon.

Item.name: Volatile Nuclear Core
Item.description: When placed inside a nuclear casing, is capable of generating a massive detonation laden with radiation, but it is poorly shielded and constantly leaks radiation.

Item.name: Uranium Nuclear Core
Item.description: When placed inside a nuclear casing, is capable of generating a massive detonation.

Item.name: Thermonuclear Core
Item.description: When placed inside a nuclear casing, is capable of generating a detonation capable of erasing even the biggest stations from the map. High effiency makes its fallout minimal.

Item.name: Resonant Nuclear Core
Item.description: When placed inside a nuclear casing, is capable of generating a relatively small detonation. The electromagnetic pulse of this core has been tuned to resonate with the primers of explosives, detonating all of them within a significant radius.

Item.name: Control Chip [Remote Timed]
Item.description: A control chip for a nuclear device designed to immediately detonate it upon receiving a remote signal.

Item.name: Control Chip [Remote]
Item.description: A control chip for a nuclear device designed to immediately detonate it upon receiving a remote signal.

Item.name: Remote Trigger [Channel N]
Item.description: A signalling device, configured to trigger a nuclear device.

Item.name: Control Chip Pinpointer
Item.description: A signalling device, configured to find nearby nuclear control chips.

Item.name: Shielded Container
Item.description: A shielded container capable of holding a single nuclear core, or anything else that'd fit in its place.

Item.name: Nail Gun
Item.description: An antiquated tool which predated the use of standalone welding tools. Though it remains effective, welding tools surpass it in almost every way.

Item.name: Nail
Item.description: A thin piece of iron used to bind soft materials together.

Item.name: Long Nail (Impaling)
Item.description: An exceptionally long nail intended for use as a weapon.

Item.name: Long Nail (Slashing)
Item.description: An exceptionally long nail intended for use as a weapon.

Item.name: Long Nail (Throwing)
Item.description: A long nail which can be thrown.

Item.name: Kromer's Nail (Impaling)
Item.description: An exceptionally long nail wielded by the One who Grips. It is well known for its rapid stabbing strikes. Wielding this weapon without the blessing of the One who Grips is tantamount to suicide.

Item.name: Kromer's Nail (Slashing)
Item.description: An exceptionally long nail wielded by the One who Grips. Despite looking like a nail, it is very functionally similar to a longsword. It can draw blood just the same. Wielding this weapon without the blessing of the One who Grips is tantamount to suicide.

Item.name: Kromer's Nail (Throwing)
Item.description: A long nail which can be thrown. This is the One who Grips' signature skill, one which catches most off surprise and is often fatal. Wielding this weapon without the blessing of the One who Grips is tantamount to suicide.

Item.name: Rusty Nail
Item.description: Rusty nails, made brittle by the elements, are useless for construction and deal little physical damage. You should avoid getting stabbed by one.

Item.name: Test Nail
Item.description: TESTING ONLY

Item.name: Throwable Rock
Item.description: A small rock which can be thrown.

Item.name: Purifier's Nail Gun
Item.description: A nail launcher built into a purifier's arm.

Item.name: Purifier's Tremormittelhammer
Item.description: A large, heavy sledgehammer with an internal miniaturized discharge coil. Unlike the more common shockhammer, this coil has a much more controlled discharge, similar to that of a stun baton.

Item.name: Purifier's Tremorkleinhammer
Item.description: A one-handed tremorhammer modified for rapid strikes. Very good for aggressive close quarters combat.

Item.name: Tremormittelhammer
Item.description: A large, heavy sledgehammer with an internal miniaturized discharge coil. Unlike the more common shockhammer, this coil has a much more controlled discharge, similar to that of a stun baton.

Item.name: Tremorkleinhammer
Item.description: A one-handed tremorhammer modified for rapid strikes. Very good for aggressive close quarters combat.

Item.name: Hellspanner (Repair Mode)
Item.description: An oversized metal wrench. One end functions as a normal wrench, while the other is an electric chainsaw and screwdriver combination. Its heft is best managed by well-built mechanics. In Repair Mode, it functions as a multitool. Striking an enemy with a battery inserted will cause Tremor, driving in any nails.

Item.name: Hellspanner (Chainsaw Mode)
Item.description: An oversized metal wrench. One end functions as a normal wrench, while the other is an electric chainsaw. Its heft is best managed by well-built mechanics. In Saw Mode it becomes a dangerous weapon, but requires a battery to function. It can cut through walls and doors with ease.

Item.name: Hellspanner Spawner
Item.description: An oversized metal wrench.

Item.name: Hellspanner Spawner
Item.description: An oversized metal wrench.

Item.name: Antique Manual Pistol
Item.description: An antique-looking manually operated pistol which can fire a half-inch metal sphere at surprising speeds. You couldn't hit the broad side of an Orca with this, but it'll hurt like hell if it lands.

Item.name: Abyssal Manual Pistol
Item.description: It took the blessing of the Abyss to make this thing remotely accurate.

Item.name: Antique Manual Rifle
Item.description: A manually operated single-shot rifle. It looks like an antique, fortunately it actually contains sealed components and works underwater. It's pretty inaccurate but hits like a truck.

Item.name: Antique Lead Ball
Item.description: A simple ball of lead along with propellant. A simple but powerful ammunition.

Item.name: Antique Nitro Ball
Item.description: A volatile ball of nitroglycerin which uses stabilozine as a one-time shock absorber to endure being fired.

Item.name: Antique Physicorium Ball
Item.description: A simple ball of physicorium plus some propellant. Makes for a cheap but devastating projectile.

Item.name: Ventdweller Arc Emitter
Item.description: An arc emitter which has been significantly improved by the Ventdwellers. Its rate of fire has improved at the cost of stun duration.

Item.name: Helltorch
Item.description: A madman's retrofit of a welding tool. Its range is greater than that of a standard welder, and it also works as a cutter if you insert an oxygen tank.

Item.name: Space Pen
Item.description: Space Pens were created on Earth many years ago to overcome the issue that traditional ink pens struggle to write without gravity. Europa's low gravity means a pen like this can be worth more than an old souvenir - it is often the most reliable pen you'll find.

Item.name: Space Pen
Item.description: Space Pens were created on Earth many years ago to overcome the issue that traditional ink pens struggle to write without gravity. Europa's low gravity means a pen like this can be worth more than an old souvenir - it is often the most reliable pen you'll find.

Item.name: Space Pen
Item.description: Space Pens were created on Earth many years ago to overcome the issue that traditional ink pens struggle to write without gravity. Europa's low gravity means a pen like this can be worth more than an old souvenir - it is often the most reliable pen you'll find.

Item.name: Scavenger's Revolver
Item.description: A revolver that has been modified to accept different round types, from revolver ammo to shotgun ammo to rifle ammo. Its cylinder and barrel can be rapidly reconfigured even in the heat of combat, but it only allows a single shot before a reload.

Item.name: Ethanol Bottle
Item.description: A large rum-sized bottle full of ethanol. Not the most pleasant drink, and it tends to be extremely flammable.

Item.name: Lead Pipe
Item.description: A spare pipe that makes for a good improvised weapon.
